rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with natural light and a small foyer area.

rooms.name: Open-plan Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: An expansive space featuring Bohemian decor, open kitchen integration, high ceilings, and floor-to-ceiling windows for abundant natural light. Adheres to Vastu principles by orienting the living area towards the east.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony overlooking the garden. Designed for relaxation and optimal air flow.

rooms.name: Bathroom (attached to Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: Well-lit bathroom designed in accordance with local norms and Vastu principles ensuring proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom featuring Bohemian design accents. Provides privacy while maintaining a connected feel.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated gym area with ample space for fitness equipment and a motivational layout.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light and energy flow.
